channel.title: Dystopian | 24/7 | VPS hosted | Dicing | PVP | Master/Pure | Construction
channel.description:
Ip : dystopian-pvp.no-ip.biz Client : http://uppit.com/v/T013OA3S
~~Welcome to Dystopian PVP~~
Staff:
Owner - Damien Administrator - None Moderator - None Moderator - None Moderator - None
Features
::master and ::pure, or stay level 3! 100% pvp, no bugs! AGS, VLS, and more Can log in on any client! Construction! Theiving, Crafting, Fletching, Firemaking, and more! 100% Pest Control! Dicing!
Use any client to play! (NOTE: Construction will not work on moparscape client)
This is a frostie-scape source. It's about 90% leeched (Don't flame me, this is my first legit rsps ownership) Credits: 10% me 90% Creator of frostiescape and creator of cammy pvp
Our economy is mostly based on pvp. But you can get money from skilling.
Pictures: [img]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p530/malikistosexy/1.png[/img] [img]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p530/malikistosexy/2.png[/img] [img]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p530/malikistosexy/3.png[/img] [img]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p530/malikistosexy/4.png[/img] [img]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p530/malikistosexy/5.png[/img] [img]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p530/malikistosexy/6.png[/img] [img]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p530/malikistosexy/7.png[/img] [img]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p530/malikistosexy/8.png[/img]

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

damienbreadon:

Use any client with an ip changer. Webbers client, Moparscape, Silab, etc.

You’re doing it wrong. At least you were being halfway honest when you said It’s 90% leeched. Good luck with this, I’m sure you’re going to be flooded with players. I don’t think I’ve ever been so facetious in my entire life.
